about.summary: Great Circle calculations in Python using Vincenty's formulae.

name: pygc
raw_recipe:
{% set version = "1.0.0" %}
package:
    name: pygc
    version: {{ version }}

source:
    fn: pygc-{{ version }}.tar.gz
    url: https://github.com/axiom-data-science/pygc/archive/{{ version }}.tar.gz
    sha256: 70c5b3bdfc4d292abbdb5002ea17557da1bc977a14e812055817b341c965bc1f

build:
    number: 0
    script: python setup.py install --single-version-externally-managed --record record.txt

requirements:
    build:
        - python
        - setuptools
    run:
        - python
        - numpy

test:
    imports:
        - pygc

about:
    home: https://github.com/kwilcox/pygc
    license: GNU General Public License v3 (GPLv3)
    summary: "Great Circle calculations in Python using Vincenty's formulae."

extra:
    recipe-maintainers:
        - kwilcox
        - ocefpaf
